text: jinsillo haneulgwa daejiui changjowa, bamgwa naj-ui gyoche, ingan-ege deug-i doeneun geos-eul sidgo badaleul hanghaehaneun seonbag, hananimkkeseo haneullobuteo bileul naelisieo geugeos-eulosseo jug-eo issdeon daejie saengmyeong-eul bul-eoneoh-eusigo geugos-e modeun jonglyuui gieo danineun dongmul-eul peotteulisimgwa, balam-ui byeonhwamussangham, haneulgwa daeji saie issneun guljonghaneun guleum-eneun iseong-eul gajin salamdeul-eul wihan jingpyoga issnola
